issue.title: [Java][C++] Reorganize JNI code from several modules
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16691](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16691). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have several modules implementing JNI wrappers:

1. gandiva
1. plasma
1. dataset
1. orc
   
   We can reorganize all the JNI-related codes, maybe into a single parent module, to split out the common utilities (e.g. memory pool, exception handling, reference management).
